reviewText:
This video is great.

Inspired me to try making my own planes.

Very thorough, explaining almost all steps.  Discusses tools needed etc.  The only complaint, volume of the dvd is inconsistent. I had to adjust my volume several times.  Better than the book but a bigger cost difference.  Very good overall.
If you are interested in planes this is a great way to understand how molding planes are made and how they work
Excellent DVD, lots of detail and information on making traditional Side Escapement Planes.
